content.question: Which of the following best describes the source of persistent organic pollutants (<math alttext="P O Ps" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mstyle mathvariant="normal"><mrow><mi>P</mi><mi>O</mi><mi>P</mi><mi>s</mi></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></math>) that could accumulate in the tissues of a top predator?

choices.label: Methane (<math alttext="C H 4" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mtext>C</mtext><mtext>H</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>4</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></math>) and carbon dioxide (<math alttext="C O 2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>C</mtext><msub><mrow><mtext>O</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></math>) released from livestock operations

<math alttext="D D T" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mstyle mathvariant="normal"><mrow><mi>D</mi><mi>D</mi><mi>T</mi></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></math> and other pesticides that are sprayed to control for mosquitoes
<math alttext="C F Cs" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>CFCs</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> that are manufactured to be used as pesticides

Sulfur dioxide (<math alttext="S O 2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>S</mtext><msub><mrow><mtext>O</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></math>) released from coal-burning power plants

content.answer: <math alttext="D D T" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mstyle mathvariant="normal"><mrow><mi>D</mi><mi>D</mi><mi>T</mi></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></math> and other pesticides that are sprayed to control for mosquitoes

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain environmental concepts and processes.
